B

BinarySemaphore - Class in semaphore
Blocking binary semaphores.
BinarySemaphore(String, int) - Constructor for class semaphore.BinarySemaphore
This is a binary semaphore, so the limiting value is predefined as being one.
BlockingSemaphore - Class in semaphore
Blocking bounded semaphores.
BlockingSemaphore(String, int, int) - Constructor for class semaphore.BlockingSemaphore
Initialise the semaphore.
BlockingSemaphore(String, int) - Constructor for class semaphore.BlockingSemaphore
Initialise the semaphore.
boundedBuffer - package boundedBuffer
An implementation of bounded buffers using semaphores to protect buffer access.
buffer - Variable in class boundedBuffer.AbstractBuffer
The buffer.
Buffer<T> - Class in boundedBuffer
Completes the implementation of buffers in AbstractBuffer, implementing the Buffer.put(Object) and Buffer.get() methods.
Buffer(int) - Constructor for class boundedBuffer.Buffer
The constructor sets the size of the buffer, and initialises the semaphores
buffer - Variable in class boundedBuffer.Consumer
The buffer used by this consumer.
buffer - Variable in class boundedBuffer.Producer
The buffer used by this producer.
BufferError - Exception in boundedBuffer
A simple buffer error class.
BufferError() - Constructor for exception boundedBuffer.BufferError
 
BufferError(String) - Constructor for exception boundedBuffer.BufferError
 
BufferSystem - Class in boundedBuffer
Sets up and runs a buffer, producer and consumer.
BufferSystem() - Constructor for class boundedBuffer.BufferSystem
